entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 28 April 2023
